column4: QUESTION. When i run sudo apt-get update, it says it ignores some linies: Ignores http://dk.archive.ubuntu.com karmic-updates/main Translation-da   - I'm a kind of new to Linux - but I'd love som help with this
if there is no update for that location. then it skips it.  so its ignored.. (i think)
okay - just seems funny- If I use the GUI update interface i downloads 48 of 49 packages, and then comes out with an error that it could not get some of the packages.
Ok, then I guess I just have to ignore it.
